name: Soda Jerk Pinball
description: This is an original pinball created as a 1979 pinball machine. This machine never existed! The goal is to Spell out "Soda Jerk" and then hit the drop down targets to get multipliers. The In-Game game play gives more instructions. The sounds system was created by DLG creations with some per-recorded sounds for the pinball mechanics. The pinball has a gate and when open you can not loose the ball on the left out lanes. Good players will have to nudge the ball. It can be set as 3 or 5 ball and can be set as a conservative play for more of a challenge.
